reviews.customers_say: Customers love the sweater's color blocking and find it soft, warm, and comfortable, with one noting it's thick enough without being itchy.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute Sweater
items.body: Super cute, looks just as show in pictures. Decently thick sweater & not scratchy. Wore out during cold weather with another jacket on top & was kept toasty warm. Does run short length wise, I usually wear a small & sized up to a medium for the perfect fit. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Anastasia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable!
items.body: Adorable!! It’s so soft and the colors are so bright and cute! I got a size small and the color pink and orange. It fits very well. It is a little cropped but not enough to show stomach which I didn’t realize but i don’t mind. I can’t wait to wear it more! Read more
items.author: MaggieBeth

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fabulous color & cozy warmth!
items.body: I love love the beautiful greens in this sweater! The sweater is well made with a loser weave. It's soft cozy and warm enough for mild southern weather but for cooler weather I'd definitely wear a t-shirt underneath and be toasty all day. The sweater is such it could be dressed up, but I like it with jeans. I wear a medium and this fits true to size. The sleeves are a tad long on me but I'm short and cuff can be rolled up. It's oversized enough to be comfortable but not too bulky. It washes up well and retains the bright beautiful color I bought it for! If you are into color seasons this is a great purchase for springs! Read more
items.author: Scuppy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars As described.
items.body: The sweater is exactly as described. I followed the size chart and it fits perfectly. The colors are vibrant, the material is good quality, and it’s thick enough without being itchy or uncomfortable. It arrived on time as well, kudos to the seller and Amazon. Read more
items.author: Bethany

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Vary in size
items.body: My family and I bought a range of colors for a silly photo shoot and they all came in with very different sizes. Some had long arms, some had short torsos, and one had a stain. They were warm and had cute colors, but I would not buy again. Read more
items.author: Ashlyn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it!
items.body: Very cozy, not itchy at all! Loved the style and fit, good quality for the price for sure! The colors are spot on from the picture. I used a little band to crop it for this outfit but it could be worn regular with jeans also! Read more
items.author: Delacey

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Sized for a small child, not an adult.....cheaply made
items.body: Too short....barely reaches my waist. This sweater is sized for a child, not an adult. And the fabric is very cheap so this sweater would not last long. Read more
items.author: CDP

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sweater
items.body: I like my sweater big. This is everything I could ask for. It is warm, soft and doesn't scratch. Also it isn't heavy Read more
items.author: Cassandra Williams

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Light Blue, Brown, Gray, Navy, Khaki, Orange Pink, Pink, Bright Pink, Blue, Rose, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
